title: [Atoll, Shattered Shell Shore]
description: Further out to sea, the ocean waters glow a crystal blue, a stark difference to the dark waters surrounding the atoll.  As the terrain widens along the ring of the beach, the obsidian path suddenly narrows, the sand below the consistency of fine gravel stippled with assorted fragments of strange shells.

Further out to sea, the ocean waters glow a crystal blue, a stark difference to the dark waters surrounding the atoll.  The obsidian path suddenly stops as the terrain widens along the ring of the beach, the sand below almost gravel-like with assorted fragments of strange shells.
